description: Popular language for AI service

name: Fast API
description: Popular python framework, create OpenAPI docs directly.

name: KaryaKarsa Data Migration
description: KaryaKarsa data migration is planned as main library for create database migration, it should support MySQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB. Please refer to Blibli public repository for their data mibration service https://github.com/bliblidotcom/data-migration
